set(HEADER_FILES

)

  src/DLLMainInputDriverDI8.cpp
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )




#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********



if (WIN32)

  add_library( inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8 ${ALL_FILES} )
  add_dependencies( inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8 gucefINPUT gucefCORE gucefMT )
  target_link_libraries( inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8 gucefINPUT gucefCORE gucefMT dinput8.lib dxguid.lib )
  set_target_properties( inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8 PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "INPUTDRIVERDIRECTINPUT8_BUILD_MODULE;BUILD_GUCEF_INPUT_PLUGIN_DLL" )
  GUCEF_config_plugin( inputdriverDIRECTINPUT8 )

endif(WIN32)
